channel.title: Geting items and money, please help
channel.description: I can't seem to figure out how to get items and outher things, I've trying a lot of things but I don't understand, can anyone help me?

item.title: Geting items and money, please help
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

[quote=“Ani Artix, post:13, topic:151621”]DO I have to be in a bank or just out in the open? I have a lot of money, 83m realy, I got it from buying arrows.
Buy a lot of arrows and runes and they give YOU money.[/quote]You can be anywhere

Read full topic

item.title: Geting items and money, please help
item.dc:creator: @Ani_Artix Ani Artix
item.description:
@Ani_Artix wrote:

DO I have to be in a bank or just out in the open? I have a lot of money, 83m realy, I got it from buying arrows.
Buy a lot of arrows and runes and they give YOU money.

item.title: Geting items and money, please help
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

Yes you use that, and I’m guessing you’re playing on hybridscape…lol
Just type this:

::pickup 0995 1000

That will give you 1k, play around with the items & stuff especially if you’re new around here… Have fun

Read full topic
item.source: Geting items and money, please help

item.title: Geting items and money, please help

item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

[quote=“Ani Artix, post:10, topic:151621”]I don’t undertand that last comment. I just need help entering the code, do I add ’ :: '[/quote]Type it just the way it is:
::pickup 0995 100000

Read full topic

You use this command
::pickup “ItemId” “amount”
